details:
Case 101 is a 61 year-old male Singapore Citizen who has no recent travel history to China, Daegu and Cheongdo, but had been in Batam from 21 February to 23 February. He is linked to Case 103.

He reported onset of symptoms on 25 February. He had presented at the emergency department at Ng Teng Fong General Hospital on 28 February with Case 102 and was immediately isolated. Subsequent test results confirmed COVID-19 infection on 29 February morning.

Prior to hospital admission, he had gone to work at Asia Asset Recovery Pte Ltd and visited the Eye Clinic at Ng Teng Fong General Hospital with Case 102. He stays at Bukit Batok Street 24.
